title: Live Media Encoding Site Reliability Engineer
summary: Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work. Every new product we build, service we create, or Apple Store experience we deliver is the result of us making each other's ideas stronger.
description: Come join a team of technical and creative partners working on a wide variety of projects for Apple. In support of these efforts, you will exercise your previous hardware and software engineering expertise for initial system design, performance benchmarking, deployment, on-site user operation, and post-operational support of successful media encoding systems used in content production.
preferred_qualifications: Expertise in Encoder SW/HW development, ground up build experience, expertise in Linux & CLI environments, expertise in MacOS environments, expertise in CI/CD configuration deployment, IT skills applicable to media production engineering tasks, familiarity with SMPTE 2110 IP audio and video workflows, experience in REMI-based production environments, QC skills for media signals in production.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role is between $150,000 and $287,700, and also includes benefits like comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, stock options, discounts on products, reimbursement for education, discretionary bonuses, relocation assistance, and more.
